content:
I'm getting the following build error: When using the HL7 template, the IG id must start with "hl7." - found fhir.us.security-gov-regs.
Since the id of the IG is fhir.us.security-gov-regs, I'm wondering what needs to change. Do I need to prefix the id with hl7.?
You'll get better responses in #IG creation . But yes, if it's an HL7 published IG it needs the hl7 prefix
